segments.text: Ugh, the sink is gushing water all over the place—disgusting mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is spreading like a gross stain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the cabinet doors are dripping wet; what a sloppy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids climbing for cookies while everything's soaking—yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks filthy from the floor, and he's on it barefoot maybe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing dishes stacked near all this water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen reeks of carelessness; it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the open window can't air out this nasty situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies in this slop—how unappetizing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is clean, but inside it's a pigsty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This makes my skin crawl; someone clean it up already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor hygiene in a place where food is prepared—appalling.
segments.speaker: PAR
